text: Jilani: “Ana nantende kuwa kaligoselo jwangawaga Allah Nkugumba mawunde ni mataka? Soni Jwalakwe ni jwaakuliisya nambo jwangaliisyidwa.” Jilani: “Chisimu une namulidwe yakuti mbe jwandanda mwa waalipeleeche (pakukunda Usilamu).” Soni (salilidwe yanti): “Nkasim'ba ata panandi mwa akuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu).”
